NOTICE_DATA.ORIGINAL_CPV: Laboratory, optical and precision equipments (excl. glasses)
Industrial or laboratory furnaces, incinerators and ovens

TI_TEXT.P: Лабораторно, оптично и прецизно оборудване (без стъклени изделия)
Laboratorní, optické a přesné přístroje a zařízení (mimo skel)
Laboratorieudstyr, optisk udstyr og præcisionsudstyr (ikke briller)
Laborgeräte, optische Geräte und Präzisionsgeräte (außer Gläser)
Εξοπλισμός εργαστηριακός, οπτικός και ακριβείας (εκτός από γυαλιά)
Laboratory, optical and precision equipments (excl. glasses)
Equipo de laboratorio, óptico y de precisión (excepto gafas)
Laboriseadmed, optika- ja täppisinstrumendid (v.a klaasid)
Laboratoriolaitteet, optiset ja tarkkuuslaitteet (lukuun ottamatta silmälaseja)
Équipements de laboratoire, d'optique et de précision (excepté les lunettes)
Laboratory, optical and precision equipments (excl. glasses)
Laboratorijska, optička i precizna oprema (osim naočala)
Laboratóriumi, optikai és precíziós felszerelések (kivéve szemüvegek)
Attrezzature da laboratorio, ottiche e di precisione (escluso vetri)
Laboratorinė, optinė ir precizinė įranga (išskyrus akinius)
Laboratorijas, optiskās un precīzijas ierīces (izņemot brilles)
Tagħmir tal-laboratorju, ottiku u ta' preċiżjoni (minbarra nuċċalijiet)
Laboratoriuminstrumenten, optische en precisie-instrumenten (uitgezonderd brillen)
Sprzęt laboratoryjny, optyczny i precyzyjny (z wyjątkiem szklanego)
Equipamento laboratorial, óptico e de precisão (exc. óculos)
Echipamente de laborator, optice şi de precizie (cu excepţia ochelarilor)
Laboratórne, optické a presné prístroje a vybavenie (s výnimkou skiel)
Laboratorijska, optična in precizna oprema (razen očal)
Laboratorieutrustning, optisk utrustning och precisionsutrustning (exkl. glas)

TITLE.P: High Value Laboratory Equipment (HVLE) and Associated Products and Services

SHORT_DESCR.P: The NWUPC is seeking to establish a multi-provider framework agreement on behalf of the members of NWUPC, APUC, HEPCW, LUPC, NEUPC and SUPC for the supply and installation of high value laboratory equipment. This framework agreement will commence on 1.8.2019 for an initial period of 24 months until 31.7.2021 with the option to extend the agreement for 12 months until 31.7.2022 and a further 12 months until 31.7.2023 subject to satisfactory economic operator performance. The framework agreement will be split into 23 lots for members:
NWUPC https://www.nwupc.ac.uk/ourmembers
APUC https://www.apuc-scot.ac.uk/#!/members
HEPCW http://www.hepcw.ac.uk/about-us2/
LUPC https://www.lupc.ac.uk/member-list
NEUPC https://www.neupc.ac.uk/our-members
SUPC https://www.supc.ac.uk/about-us/our-members/our-members

The NWUPC is seeking to establish a multi-provider framework agreement on behalf of the members of NWUPC, APUC, HEPCW, LUPC, NEUPC and SUPC for the supply and installation of high value laboratory equipment. Economic operators shall accept and acknowledge that by issuing this ITT NWUPC shall not be bound to accept any tender and reserves the right not to conclude a framework agreement for high value laboratory equipment for which tenders are invited nor does it constitute an offer to enter into a contractual relationship. All costs incurred in relation to preparing and submitting a tender are to be borne by the economic operator. NWUPC shall not accept liability for any associated costs sustained by economic operators. This framework agreement will commence on 1.8.2019 for an initial period of 24 months until 31.7.2021 with the option to extend the agreement for 12 months until 31.7.2022 and a further 12 months until 31.7.2023 subject to satisfactory economic operator performance. Lot 1: Sequencers.

EU_PROGR_RELATED.P: This project may be used for ERDF-funded projects.
